## ReadOnlyTextField variable

This is a standard TextField, with default styles overridden to provide some consistent "read only look" that visually indicates the field can't be edited without looking fully disabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ReadOnlyTextField: React.FC<ITextFieldProps>
```
